resources.string: You currently do not have a Workout
Are you being treated for Hypertension?
Do you know your systolic blood pressure?
I think my blood pressure is:
Please fill out the form in order to begin the fitness test.
Lightly place your finger over the camera, but do not push too hard. Or the HR sensor will not function correctly.
You have not yet done a Fitness Test, therefore your Health Center contains no data. Please do the Fitness Test and then select a workout to begin your journey towards ultimate fitness prowess.

Fit Formula will now take your resting heart rate using the phone camera and adjacent LED light. Lightly place your finger over the camera lens, but do not push too hard, or it will not function properly. Press BEGIN when you are ready!

Fit Formula will now guide you through a Step Test in order to gauge your fitness level. Press \'Continue\' to start the instructional video\, or press \'Cancel\' to return to the beginning of the Fitness Test

Now that you know how to do the Step Test, we need to make sure you know the pace at which to do it. The pace that you are currently listening to is your \'Warm-up Pace\' and is based upon your gender and age. The first part of the Step Test will be the \'Warm-Up\' phase, and it will last 3 minutes. At the end of the Warm-Up, you will be prompted to take your heart rate again. When you are ready to begin the test, press \'Begin Warmup\'. You can cancel the test at any time by pressing \'Cancel Test\'.
Select a Calendar to store workouts:
